insert.foreach: INSERT INTO Medi_schema.Medi_Product ( Medi_no, Medi_name, Medi_total, Medi_indate, Medi_Company, Medi_safetyInven ) VALUES ( #{mediProduct.mediNo}, #{mediProduct.mediName}, #{mediProduct.mediTotal}, #{mediProduct.mediIndate}, #{mediProduct.mediCompany}, #{mediProduct.mediSafetyInven} )
